description: A few products and side projects I build to stay close to the craft.

projects.name: Memoato
projects.description: An AI-powered quantified self and journaling app designed for peak performance and life tracking.
highlights: Fast capture with natural language input
Built for consistency, not spreadsheet rituals

projects.name: XXI Today
projects.description: A Bitcoin wallet and .btc domain explorer, integrated with the XVerse wallet.
highlights: Fast .btc lookups and basic on-chain context
Built as a thin product layer over existing wallet infra

projects.name: PLAYGRND
projects.description: A community-first football scoreboard for tracking leagues, results, standings, and player stats.
highlights: Leagues, standings, and player stats in one place
Share match results with a clean public link
Built for local teams that want structure without bureaucracy

projects.name: HILLS Lab
projects.description: An independent R&D studio focused on applied AI, Bitcoin, and commerce systems.
highlights: Small teams, clear ownership, production discipline
Focused on shipping and operating real systems
